name: Auto Smash Police Street - Fast Driver Chase Edition
name_original: Auto Smash Police Street - Fast Driver Chase Edition
description:
The Cops are on your tail!! Auto Smash your way downtown and avoid getting busted, carve yourself a getaway route and blast through the streets using your in car rockets. Step up a gear and rev up those engines, the most manic chase is on! Have you got what it takes to outrun the Law?

- TOP 40 RACING GAME US, UK and 60 MORE COUNTRIES! -

Dodge the rush hour traffic and oncoming Cop Cars but watch out, those Cops will sneak up and ambush you from the side when you’re not looking!! Pick up graded money shields and earn yourself faster wheels with bigger and better rockets. Stockpile your money and grab yourself the bonus Cop Car and really turn the tables on the Police, do you have what it takes to be the best? Game Center Enabled to sort out just who’s really the Boss here!

Game Features:

- Super Fast Top Racing Action
- Money Shield Pick Ups unlock New Wheels
- 3 Getaway Cars with upgraded Rockets to choose from
- Earn yourself a bonus Cop Car
- Game Center Enabled, who’s the Boss?
